name: DailyRenouncePractice
0:
”Alexa, open daily renounce practice and get drp”
””
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily renounce practice
des: In today's world, we are so busy that we never get a chance to think about renounce practices. Slowly, we're forgetting the use of renounce in our lives. Daily Renounce Practice will give you one task that you have to or not have to do today. It works to limit our needs and desires and practice self-restraint.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
